name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Demonstrated expertise in building scalable applications utilizing **Git**, **Linux**, and **Kubernetes**, along with strong knowledge of **Cmake** and **GoogleTest** for robust software testing and development. Skilled in implementing event-driven architectures and deploying applications within a **RabbitMQ** and **Cassandra** infrastructure.
Proficient in collaborating within cross-functional teams, fostering effective communication and teamwork while adhering to compliance standards. Proven ability to deliver high-performance applications tailored to meet healthcare and financial sector needs while harnessing AI/ML technology. Versatile in leveraging cloud services and automation to enhance system performance.
